The avatar is at (6, 12). The position is not changed. I need to analyze the state and act accordingly. There are boulders above me and around me. Going left, right, up or down will likely trigger the boulder. I need to destroy the dirt block to the right of me and move right.
``` Action:3 ```
I will move right to avoid being crushed by boulders.
